name: Festering Dragon Marrow
desc:
Specialized refinement material for Festering Desire.
This is the product of purifying Durin's vile venom, which has seeped into and spread throughout Dragonspine's ley lines. By using it on a bloodthirsty sword with a strong affinity for such materials, you can increase that sword's power.

value.text:
Version 1.2 Event - The Chalk Prince and the Dragon
Event Shop - Glimmering Essence
Event Shop - Warm Essence
Event Shop - Miraculous Essence

value.name: Festering Desire
value.desc: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.
